name: newdaycareprogr
description: Program for daycare and home to communicate.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../front_newDaycareApp && npm run build && cp -r build ../back_newDaycareApp
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Sanni Vepsäläinen
